mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt ,SITE_MEMU_NM AS titleName FROM ( SELECT B.SITE_MEMU_NM ,A.V_DATE ,A.BROWSER_S FROM INFO_SITE_VISIT A ,INFO_SITE_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.SITE_URL =B.URL AND DATE_FORMAT(A.V_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'0101') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'1231') and B.MENU_TYPE not in('top') )A GROUP BY SITE_MEMU_NM ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT ,BROWSER_S AS titleName FROM ( SELECT B.SITE_MEMU_NM ,A.V_DATE ,A.BROWSER_S FROM INFO_SITE_VISIT A ,INFO_SITE_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.SITE_URL =B.URL AND DATE_FORMAT(A.V_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'0101') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'1231') and B.MENU_TYPE not in('top') )A GROUP BY BROWSER_S ORDER BY CNT DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT ,V_DATE AS titleName FROM ( SELECT B.SITE_MEMU_NM ,A.BROWSER_S ,DATE_FORMAT(A.V_DATE,'%Y%M%D') AS V_DATE FROM INFO_SITE_VISIT A ,INFO_SITE_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.SITE_URL =B.URL AND DATE_FORMAT(A.V_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'0101') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'1231') and B.MENU_TYPE not in('top') )A GROUP BY V_DATE ORDER BY V_DATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT ,V_DATE AS titleName FROM ( SELECT B.SITE_MEMU_NM ,A.BROWSER_S ,DATE_FORMAT(A.V_DATE,'%M') AS V_DATE FROM INFO_SITE_VISIT A ,INFO_SITE_MENU B WHERE 1=1 AND A.SITE_URL =B.URL AND DATE_FORMAT(A.V_DATE,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'0101') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y'),'1231') and B.MENU_TYPE not in('top') )A GROUP BY V_DATE ORDER BY V_DATE ASC
